description:
Thmanyah is the platform for the best Arabic content. Films, docuseries, and entertainment shows created with heart and produced with intent.
And it’s the exclusive hub to catch Saudi football championships live: the Saudi Super Cup, Roshn Saudi League, King’s Cup, and Yelo League.
 All streamed as you’ve never seen before, at the highest broadcast quality in their history, with features making their debut in Saudi football.

Thmanyah features for mobile and smart TVs:
• Inside the Match: real-time, in-depth stats for Saudi championships, updated moment by moment.
• Crowd & commentary control: set the perfect balance between the commentator and stadium atmosphere, or let the crowd noise take over.
• The best  Arabic content library: 30+ interests, from sports and culture to comedy and lifestyle.
• All the highlights: key moments, match recaps, and goals from Roshn Saudi League, the King’s Cup, Yelo League, and Saudi Super Cup.
• Minimal ads: a smooth viewing experience with fewer interruptions.
• One subscription, more screens: watch match streams  on two devices at the same time.
• Stay on top of the league: we’ve designed a smart experience to keep you in the know with custom alerts, goal notifications, match countdowns, and VAR results.
• Multiple commentator  options: choose your favourite voice commentator for every match.

webook.com is Saudi Arabia’s ultimate super-app for entertainment, travel, and lifestyle. It is the one-stop platform to discover and book concerts, sporting events, cultural shows, flights, hotels, restaurants, memorabilia, auctions, and more. Whether you are in Riyadh, Jeddah, the Eastern Province, or anywhere else in the Kingdom, webook.com connects you to everything exciting. With updated listings, verified bookings, and a simple interface, having fun and planning trips has never been easier.

Events & Tickets: Book tickets for concerts, festivals, sports matches, comedy shows, exhibitions, and cultural events across Saudi Arabia. From headline concerts at Riyadh Season and football games in the Roshn Saudi League to family attractions in Jeddah or workshops in Dammam, if you can book it, it is here. Follow artists, athletes, and venues to get notifications on new events. All tickets are official with no markups, and you can resell securely if plans change. Skip scalpers and queues – your tickets live safely on your phone, ready to scan at the gate.

Flights & Hotels: Plan your travel with ease. Book flights with top airlines, compare schedules, and reserve hotels or resorts at great rates through our partner almosafer. Whether flying Riyadh–Dubai, a business trip to Jeddah, or a weekend staycation in Abha, webook.com makes it simple. Filter by price, rating, or location. Choose luxury resorts, city hotels, or budget stays – all with secure payments and instant confirmation. With integrated flights and hotels search, planning your trip has never been smoother.

Restaurants & Dining: Turn outings into complete experiences by reserving tables at top restaurants. Discover Saudi Arabia’s best dining, from fine dining in Riyadh to cafés in Jeddah and trendy spots in Khobar. With integration from Servme, when you book a concert or football match you will get recommendations for nearby restaurants. Pair your event with the right meal – a romantic dinner, family lunch, or casual hangout. Book events and restaurants together in one app.

Shop & Auctions: For fans of sports, music, and culture, webook.com offers a memorabilia shop and exclusive auctions in one place. Browse and buy signed jerseys, autographed posters, and official souvenirs from your favorite teams and artists. Join live or timed auctions to bid on rare items, luxury goods, and collectibles you will not find elsewhere. During select events, take part in real-time auctions for unique pieces such as signed guitars or rare football boots. All memorabilia is verified authentic, and every auction is secure and transparent, giving you confidence as a buyer or collector.

Why webook.com?

All-in-One Platform: Tickets, flights, hotels, restaurants, memorabilia, and auctions in one app.

Trusted by Millions: Millions of users in Saudi Arabia already use webook.com.

Official Partnerships: Authorized ticketing partner for major events, including Roshn Saudi League matches.

Personalized Discovery: Recommendations based on your interests and bookings.

Secure Payments: Options like Mada, Apple Pay, credit cards, with instant confirmation.

24/7 Support: Multilingual service in Arabic and English.

From massive concerts in Riyadh to luxury dining in Jeddah, from football in Dammam to rare collectibles through auctions, webook.com is the super-app that brings it all together.

Download webook.com – fun things to do today and unlock a world of entertainment, travel, dining, shopping, and more. Discover new experiences, book what you love, and make memories with a few taps. From concerts in Riyadh to flights for your next holiday, restaurants in Jeddah to memorabilia and auctions, webook.com has it all. Having fun has never been this simple – everything you need is in one app.

Your next adventure starts here. With webook.com, you will never miss the experiences that matter most.

What makes 'Joy Awards' truly special, as it does every year, is that the winners are chosen by the fans who love and cherish them. With the 'Joy Awards' App, it's you who will nominate and vote for your beloved stars and releases in Music, Cinema, Series, Directors, Sports, and Influencers, all for free!



You will nominate and cast your votes in two phases:




First Phase: Nominating Your Favorite Stars and Releases
In the nomination phase, which lasts for one month, you play a crucial role in shaping the competition. 
Here's where YOU come in – choose your favorite nominee from the names or titles listed in each category. If your top pick isn't there, don't worry! You have the chance to add your own favorite name or title, as long as it meets the terms and conditions: it should be a release or achievement from 2025. 
During the nomination phase, you can nominate only once for each category.
This phase eventually leads to the selection of the top four final nominees in each category, representing the stars and releases with the most nominations.
 
Second Phase: Voting for Your Favorite Stars and Releases
After the nominations have been counted, the voting phase begins with the top four nominees in each category, which also spans one month.
Here's where YOU make the difference – cast your votes for your favorite nominees. 
And a month later, the voting counts are gathered, leading to the grand reveal of the winners during the live "Joy Awards 2026" ceremony in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
During the voting phase, you can vote only once for each category.

About the Automatic Subscription Renewal:

1. Payment: After you confirm the purchase, the fee will be automatically charged to your Apple iTunes account.

Automatic Subscription Service Description
1. VIP Subscription Benefits & Plans: Core benefit is ad removal for a seamless experience. Subscription plans include weekly and annual options; ad removal privilege takes effect immediately upon successful subscription.

2. Payment Process: Once you confirm the purchase and complete the payment, the corresponding amount will be charged directly to your linked iTunes account.

3. Auto-Renewal Rule: Your iTunes account will be automatically charged for renewal within 24 hours before the current subscription period expires. If the payment is successful, your subscription cycle will be extended by one full renewal period (e.g., 1 week for weekly plans, 1 year for annual plans).

4. Subscription Management: To manage auto-renewal or cancel your subscription:Go to your iPhone’s "Settings" → Tap "iTunes Store & App Store" → Click your "Apple ID" → Select "View Apple ID" → Navigate to the "Subscriptions" section.To cancel auto-renewal, turn off the feature at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing cycle. If you cancel within the final 24 hours of the period, no additional charges will be incurred after the current cycle ends.

MyTable كل حياتك في تطبيق واحد
MyTable — One App for Your Entire Lifestyle
MyTable يخليك تحجز، تعيش، وتشارك لحظاتك بسهولة.
MyTable lets you book, live, and share your moments effortlessly.
من مطعمك المفضل إلى أكبر الفعاليات، من صالة البادل إلى الصالون، كل شيء يبدأ هنا.
From your favorite restaurant to major events, from the padel court to the salon, everything starts here.
عِش التجربة | Live the Experience
احجز طاولتك، مقعدك، أو موعدك بثوانٍ.
Reserve your table, seat, or appointment in seconds.
استمتع برحلة سلسة من البداية إلى النهاية.
Enjoy a smooth journey from start to finish.
شارك لحظتك | Share Your Moment
انشر استوري عن يومك وخلي أصحابك يشوفونك ويتفاعلون.
Post a story about your day and let friends see and react.
ضيف صورك وتجاربك في البوست وخلاصتك الخاصة.
Add photos and updates in posts and your personal feed.
سجّل حضورك مع التشيك إن وخلي وجودك واضح.
Check in to mark your presence and make it visible.
تواصل بسهولة | Connect Effortlessly
سوّ قروب مع أصحابك وخططوا لكل شيء مع بعض.
Create groups with friends and plan everything together.
ارسل دعوة بلمسة، وتأكدوا من الحضور مباشرة.
Send an invite with one tap and get confirmations instantly.
تواصل عبر المحادثات المباشرة بدون تعقيد.
Stay in touch with direct messages, simple and fast.
اكتشف الجديد | Discover What’s Next
تابع الترندات وشوف وين الناس موجودين.
Follow trends and see where people are hanging out.
اكتشف مطاعم جديدة، فعاليات مثيرة، وصالونات وتجارب ما جربتها قبل.
Discover new restaurants, exciting events, and wellness experiences you’ve never tried before.
MyTable يخليك دائمًا جزء من الحدث.
MyTable keeps you always part of what’s happening.
القطاعات | Sectors
المطاعم والمقاهي: حجوزات لحظية ودخول سلس.
Dining & Cafés: Instant reservations and smooth entry.
الفعاليات والمواسم: تذاكر وجدولة سهلة بتحديث مباشر.
Events & Seasons: Tickets and simple scheduling with live updates.
الرياضة والأنشطة: ملاعب بادل، جيم، مغامرات.
Sports & Activities: Padel courts, gyms, and adventures.
الصالونات والعناية: سبا، تجميل، حلاقة.
Salons & Wellness: Spa, beauty, and grooming.
السفر والضيافة: فنادق والشاليهات ورحلات وباقات جاهزة.
Travel & Hospitality: Hotels, chalet, trips, and ready-made packages.
أمثلة حية | Real-Life Moments
تخيل الجمعة مع أصحابك، تحجز مطعم جديد وتسوون تشيك إن وتوثقون اللحظة بالاستوري.
Imagine Friday night with friends, booking a new restaurant, checking in, and capturing the moment in stories.
أو مباراة بادل، تسوي قروب، تدعو الكل، وتوثق الفوز بالبوست.
Or a padel match, creating a group, inviting everyone, and sharing the victory in a post.
حتى أبسط لحظاتك مثل قهوة الصبح أو زيارة صالون تتحول لتجربة تقدر تشاركها.
Even your simplest moments like morning coffee or a salon visit become shareable experiences.

ليش MyTable؟ | Why MyTable?
لأن حياتك أسهل لما تكون كلها في تطبيق واحد.
Because life is easier when everything is in one app.
لأنك تقدر تحجز وتشارك وتكتشف بدون ما تغير مكانك.
Because you can book, share, and discover without switching apps.
لأن كل يوم مع MyTable هو فرصة جديدة.
Because every day with MyTable is a new opportunity.
MyTable: التجربة تبدأ هنا
MyTable: The Experience Starts Here
من عشاء مع أصحابك، إلى مباراة بادل، إلى جلسة استرخاء في سبا، كل لحظة تبدأ هنا وتشاركها بسهولة.
From dinner with friends to a padel match to a relaxing spa session, every moment starts here and is shared effortlessly.
MyTable هو تطبيقك لأسلوب حياة متكامل سهل، ممتع، واجتماعي.
MyTable is your app for a complete lifestyle simple, fun, and social.

description:
Private Video Saver offers a unique browsing experience beyond the basics. From QR code site access to AI-powered content summaries, it keeps your discoveries secure with passcode protection and automatically clears all traces, such as history, cookies, and cache, after every session! It also features a built-in video editor supporting video reverse, convert video, adjust volume, adjust speed, and flip & rotate, along with a convenient bookmark function for saving your favorite sites!


Features of Video Saver:

Video Editor
	• A built-in studio at your fingertips: convert video, reverse playback, adjust volume, change speed, and flip & rotate with ease.
Private Saver
	• Hidden behind an unbreakable vault, your private content stays invisible to anyone but you.
Quick QR Scan Access
	• Instantly unlock any website by scanning a QR code or url: fast, safe, seamless, and hassle-free.
Photo Identifier & Search
	• Turn every photo into unlimited power: identify, decode, and search the world in seconds.
AI Summarize
	• Quickly extract online article summaries, AI-powered insights in seconds.
Auto-Clear on Exit
	• Vanish without a trace: every session erases itself the moment you leave.
Bookmark Manager
	• Save, organize, and revisit your favorite sites anytime with a simple tap.

Who's the imposter among your friends?
Imposter is the ultimate party game of bluffing, guessing, and social deduction. Grab 3-5 friends, sit around one device, and find out who’s lying.

How to Play:
1- All players see the same secret word—except one.
2- The imposter only sees the word “Imposter.”
3- One by one, players say a word related to the secret word.
4- The imposter must fake it and try to blend in without knowing the word.
5- Keep giving words and talking until someone thinks they've figured it out.

Fun, fast, and full of suspicion—perfect for game nights, road trips, or hanging out with friends.

Features:
- Play locally with 3 to 15 friends
- 10+ categories like food, movies, jobs, and more
- 500+ unique words and growing
- No accounts, no setup—just start playing
- Great for all ages—kids, teens, and adults

Built for laughs, bluffing, and epic "aha!" moments

Download now and start your next Imposter showdown!
